Emerald Bay Golf Club Destin: 1-850-837-5197 4781 Clubhouse Drive | Destin, FL 32541 | Book Tee Times Online Toggle navigation Home Course Membership Member Login Tournaments & Outings Grille Guesthouse Events News Real Estate Emerald Bay Golf Club Membership Show Video On Course Page 2/26/16 End Show Video On Course Page Images 0=No Image 1=1Image 2=Multi Image Slideshow Emerald Bay Golf Club offers a range of membership options designed to suit the needs of individuals and families. Whether you’re interested in a flexible monthly membership or an unlimited annual program, there’s a plan that fits your lifestyle. All memberships provide access to both Emerald Bay and Seascape golf courses, giving you even more opportunities to experience the best golf in Destin. In addition to golfing privileges, membership comes with a host of exclusive benefits. Members enjoy preferred tee times, GHIN handicap services, unlimited access to the driving range, special guest rates, merchandise discounts, and charging privileges at both Emerald Bay and Seascape Golf Clubs. Beyond the course, members have access to the Emerald Bay pool and tennis courts, as well as discounts on beach services and watersports at Seascape Beach. They also receive savings at the Whale’s Tail Beach Bar & Grill, discounts on vacation rental condos at Seascape Resort, and access to the Seascape Amenity Program, which offers even more exclusive perks. For more details, please refer to the attached membership program information.
